      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WindowsUpdateForBusinessConfiguration WindowsUpdateForBusinessConfiguration.Builder.build() 
      WindowsUpdateForBusinessConfiguration WindowsUpdateForBusinessConfiguration.patch()
      Submits only changed fields for update and returns an immutable copy of this with changed fields reset.
      WindowsUpdateForBusinessConfiguration WindowsUpdateForBusinessConfiguration.put()
      Submits all fields for update and returns an immutable copy of this with changed fields reset (they were ignored anyway).
